info.name: Files Share Link Renamer
info.description: This is an add-in to the Files app, which allows you to customize your share tokens, so your links can be https://cloud.ex/s/bachelorparty instead of https://cloud.ex/s/qPv1SwbU5M2YEoJZ. Just share a file or folder (or click an already shared one) and a new button will appear below the share link URL in the sidebar of the Files app.
info.author: Fallon Turner
